The Vision is the first thing to go... (Eagle Eye trait)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Hospital (Illnesses/Characteristics): The Vision is the first thing to go... (Eagle Eye trait)
By GoldenBoy on Wednesday, January 1, 2003 - 06:39 am:

Had this happen to a couple monsters:

Monster earns Eagle Eye from a coach or by birth.
Uses it well for several years (the higher ACC is
great on Golems btw) Then when older age sets in
the trait changes to near sight of Far sight,
depending on which attacks I used more (I think).

Pretty amusing and realistic I thought.
